title: my smurf finally hit 30
body:
was planning on throwing my placements to get bronze.  i even lost the first game getting stuck supporting.  but i just couldnt lose on purpose, it felt weird.

ended going 9/1 and placed gold 3.  i fear i will never get to visit the wonders of bronze :(.

http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=nightpuffs
